verses.roman:
eta śuni' mahāprabhura ha-ila kruddha mana
krodhāveśe bale tāre tarjana-vacana

synonyms: eta—thus; śuni'-hearing; mahāprabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ha-ila—there was; kruddha—angry; mana—mind; krodha-āveśe—out of intense anger; bale—says; tāre—unto him; tarjana—chastising; vacana—words.
translation: Hearing this, Caitanya Mahāprabhu appeared greatly angry, and in that angry mood He spoke some words chastising him.
